system_overview.name: UniverserERP
system_overview.description: A comprehensive Enterprise Resource Planning system designed for managing various business operations including financial management, human resources, fleet management, operations, and more.

financial_management.name: Financial Management
financial_management.description: Comprehensive financial tracking, reporting, and analysis system
common_questions: How do I view my financial dashboard?
How to generate a financial report?
Where can I see cash flow statements?

responses.dashboard: You can access the Financial Dashboard from the main navigation sidebar. It provides real-time insights into your financial metrics, cash flow, profit/loss, and key financial indicators.
responses.reports: To generate financial reports, navigate to the Financial Dashboard and look for the Reports section. You can create profit & loss statements, balance sheets, cash flow reports, and custom financial analytics.
responses.cost_centers: Cost center management is available in the Financial Dashboard. You can create, edit, and track different cost centers, allocate expenses, and monitor cost center performance.

hr_management.name: Human Resources Management
hr_management.description: Complete HR management system for employee data, payroll, and personnel management
common_questions: How do I add a new employee?
Where can I manage leave requests?

responses.add_employee: To add a new employee, go to the HR Dashboard and click on 'Add Employee' or 'Employee Management'. Fill in the required details including personal information, job details, salary, and department.
responses.payroll: Payroll processing is handled through the Payroll Management Dashboard. You can process monthly payroll, view payslips, manage deductions, and handle tax calculations.
responses.leave_management: Leave requests can be managed in the HR Dashboard under the 'Leave Management' section. Employees can submit requests, and managers can approve or reject them with proper workflow.

fleet_management.name: Fleet Management
fleet_management.description: Comprehensive vehicle fleet management and tracking system
common_questions: How do I add a new vehicle?
Where can I track fuel consumption?
How to assign drivers to vehicles?

responses.add_vehicle: To add a new vehicle, navigate to Fleet Management Dashboard and click 'Add Vehicle'. Enter vehicle details including make, model, registration number, purchase date, and specifications.
responses.maintenance: Maintenance scheduling is available in the Maintenance Dashboard. You can create scheduled maintenance tasks, track maintenance history, and set up automated reminders.
responses.fuel_tracking: Fuel consumption tracking is part of the Fleet Management Dashboard. Monitor fuel usage, costs, and efficiency across your entire fleet.

housing_management.name: Housing Management
housing_management.description: Property and housing management for company-owned or managed properties
common_questions: How do I add a new property?
Where can I track rent payments?

responses.add_property: To add a new property, go to Housing Management Dashboard and select 'Add Property'. Enter property details, location, specifications, and rental information.
responses.tenant_management: Tenant management is handled through the Housing Dashboard. You can add tenants, track lease agreements, and manage tenant communications.
responses.rent_collection: Rent collection and payment tracking is available in the Financial Dashboard under Accounts Receivable, specifically for housing-related income.

inventory_management.name: Inventory Management
inventory_management.description: Stock tracking, procurement, and warehouse management system
common_questions: How do I check stock levels?
How to create a purchase order?
How to set up low stock alerts?

responses.stock_levels: Stock levels can be monitored in real-time through the Inventory Dashboard. View current stock, minimum levels, and get alerts for low inventory items.
responses.purchase_orders: To create purchase orders, go to Inventory Management and select 'Purchase Orders'. You can create new orders, track existing ones, and manage supplier relationships.
responses.suppliers: Supplier management is available in the Inventory Dashboard. Add new suppliers, track supplier performance, and manage supplier communications.

maintenance_management.name: Maintenance Management
maintenance_management.description: Comprehensive maintenance tracking and scheduling system
common_questions: How do I submit a maintenance request?
Where can I track maintenance costs?
How to set up predictive maintenance?

responses.maintenance_request: To submit a maintenance request, use the Maintenance Dashboard and click 'New Request'. Describe the issue, assign priority, and track progress through completion.
responses.preventive_scheduling: Preventive maintenance scheduling is available in the Maintenance Scheduling Dashboard. Set up recurring maintenance tasks based on time, usage, or condition.
responses.cost_tracking: Maintenance costs are tracked in the Maintenance Dashboard. View cost breakdowns, analyze maintenance expenses, and generate cost reports.

accounts_payable.name: Accounts Payable
accounts_payable.description: Vendor payment management and accounts payable processing
common_questions: How do I add a new vendor?

responses.add_vendor: To add a new vendor, go to Accounts Payable section and select 'Vendor Management'. Enter vendor details, payment terms, and contact information.
responses.invoice_processing: Invoice processing is handled through the Accounts Payable Dashboard. Upload invoices, match to purchase orders, and schedule payments.
responses.payment_scheduling: Payment scheduling can be managed in the Accounts Payable section. Set up automatic payments, approve pending payments, and manage cash flow.

accounts_receivable.name: Accounts Receivable
accounts_receivable.description: Customer payment tracking and accounts receivable management
common_questions: How do I add a new customer?

responses.add_customer: To add a new customer, navigate to Accounts Receivable and select 'Customer Management'. Enter customer details, credit terms, and contact information.
responses.invoice_generation: Invoice generation is available in the Sales Invoice section. Create invoices, track payments, and manage customer billing cycles.
responses.payment_tracking: Payment tracking is handled through the Accounts Receivable Dashboard. Monitor incoming payments, track outstanding amounts, and manage collections.

navigation_guide.main_dashboard: The main dashboard provides an overview of all ERP modules with key metrics and quick access to frequently used features.
navigation_guide.sidebar_navigation: Use the sidebar to navigate between different modules: Financial, HR, Fleet, Operations, Maintenance, and more.
navigation_guide.search_functionality: Most dashboards include search functionality to quickly find specific records, transactions, or reports.
navigation_guide.keyboard_shortcuts: Use common shortcuts like Ctrl+F for search, F5 to refresh data, and Esc to close modal windows.

common_workflows.new_employee_onboarding:
1. Add employee in HR Dashboard
2. Set up payroll information
3. Assign to department/cost center
4. Configure system access permissions
common_workflows.monthly_payroll:
1. Review timesheets in HR Dashboard
2. Process payroll in Payroll Management
3. Generate payslips
4. Handle tax calculations and deductions
common_workflows.maintenance_request:
1. Submit request via Maintenance Dashboard
2. Assign to technician
3. Track progress and updates
4. Complete and record costs
common_workflows.financial_reporting:
1. Navigate to Financial Dashboard
2. Select report type (P&L, Balance Sheet, etc.)
3. Choose date range and filters
4. Generate and export report

troubleshooting.cannot_access_module: If you cannot access a specific module, check your user permissions in the system settings or contact your administrator.
troubleshooting.data_not_loading: If dashboard data is not loading, try refreshing the page (F5) or check your internet connection.
troubleshooting.report_generation_fails: For report generation issues, ensure all required fields are filled and check data permissions for the selected date range.
troubleshooting.slow_performance: If the system is running slowly, try clearing your browser cache or contact support for server optimization.

best_practices.data_entry: Always ensure data accuracy when entering information. Use consistent naming conventions and double-check important fields.
best_practices.regular_backups: Regular data backups are crucial. The system automatically backs up daily, but manual backups are recommended before major changes.
best_practices.user_training: Ensure all users receive proper training on their respective modules to maximize system efficiency and data accuracy.
best_practices.regular_audits: Conduct regular data audits to maintain data integrity and identify any discrepancies early.
